Author: Flint#6435
Content: Of course, investors and maximalists would like their own Komodo token to grow in price, but the Komodo platform and the like can use Bitcoin as an operational token - not now - so in the future when they will solve bandwidth problems! and creating your own token is for the most part a desire to raise funds precisely in your own project and in the pockets of early investors! for all the genius of the platform, it is worth noting that the need for its own token is not needed for most projects!

Author: Flint#6435
Content: the strength of the binance lies in its ability to finance the most complex development tasks that cannot be solved with the bare enthusiasm and altruism of home developers! the personal time of many of them amounts to hundreds of thousands of dollars and a decentralized model of financial management cannot compete in speed and efficiency with a centralized model of binance! we need liquidity! you need REAL use of the Komodo token in addition to white paper and fantastic fantasies of the future - this is a very competitive environment where your open source tomorrow will copy a stronger and financially powerful competitor and overshadow you - this is the cornerstone of open source

Author: Flint#6435
Content: its not necessary to use the Bitcoin token itself directly! you can use its derivatives built on a particular platform and supported by stablecoins and you get, for example (BTCkmd) a token with the characteristics of a chest of drawers and with liquidity and relative stability of bitcoin itself! fintech as it is! so why do you need your own token with such liquidity and unreliability? do you understand that institutional investors will not come to invest in komodo for many years? They are just looking at Bitcoin - the ICO hype has passed - the bubble has burst - komodo can recover, but hardly in the near future! everything starts to revolve around bitcoin itself! and without institutional, this game is like a casino! weak hands can drop us the price three times more if panic starts although this is panic now
